session.objective: Address PR review feedback for Issue #910 - improve test coverage and documentation structure

decisions.decision: Add assertions for non-index files in test cases
decisions.rationale: PR review requested verification of normal processing path for 100% code coverage
decisions.impact: Increased test count from 34 to 35, verifies both skip and process paths

decisions.decision: Move ADR-017 implementation note to dedicated subsection
decisions.rationale: PR review identified note was in wrong section (Confirmation vs Implementation)

nextSteps: Monitor for any additional PR feedback

workLog.result: Identified 3 actionable comments requiring code changes

workLog.action: Enhanced test coverage for non-index files
workLog.result: Added assertions to verify non-index files are processed normally, added new test for -indexed vs -index pattern
Moved implementation note to dedicated Implementation Notes subsection
